DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect acute short-term intervention fish oil inflammatory marker overweight subject .
DOC.detailed_description: Being overweight associate metabolic syndrome , cardiovascular disease , diabetes mellitus ( type 2 ) . Adipose tissue regard active organ , produce array inflammatory mediator . This create state chronic low-grade inflammation . Inflammation proven key element development atherosclerotic plaque . The marine n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid ( PUFAs ) beneficial effect cardiovascular disease . These effect partly attribute anti-inflammatory effect n-3 PUFAs . Previous study show anti-inflammatory effect n-3 PUFAs overweight subject , study conduct high daily dose n-3 PUFA . We want examine effect lower dose 1 g n-3 PUFA/day ( dose recommend Danish Heart Foundation ) . The study randomize , placebo-controlled double blind . Fifty subject age 30 - 75 year ( postmenopausal woman ; waist circumference > 80 cm men ; waist circumference > 94 cm ) include . Blood sample fatty tissue biopsy collect baseline , 1 day 6 week .
DOC.criteria: Waist circumference ≥ 80 cm ( female ) ≥ 94 cm ( male ) Postmenopausal ( female ) Daily intake fish oil capsule Daily intake NSAIDs HbA1c ≥ 8 % Serum creatinine ≤ 30 mL/min Chronic inflammatory disease Other serious illness Inability inform consent
